precondition: The user's desktop must be visible.
action: Right-click on an empty area of the desktop.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options including "Properties".
The display properties window will open.
The Screen Saver settings will be displayed. A dropdown menu for the screen saver option is visible.

action: Click on the dropdown menu labeled "Screen saver".
expected_results: A list of screen saver options will appear.

precondition: The screen saver options dropdown menu is open.
action: Click on the "None" option in the dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu closes. The "Apply" button becomes clickable.

precondition: The "Apply" button is visible and clickable.
expected_results: The application should start running or reflect the changes made in the settings.
A dropdown menu related to power settings will appear, including options such as "Turn off hard disks".

precondition: The system displays power settings options.
action: Click on the dropdown menu labeled 'Turn off hard disks'.
expected_results: A list of time options will appear, including 'After 4 hours'.

precondition: The dropdown menu for the "Turn off hard disks" setting is expanded.
action: Select "After 4 hours" from the dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu closes. The "Turn off hard disks" setting  displays  "After 4 hours". The "OK" button is clickable.

precondition: A dialog box or window is open with an "OK" button present.
expected_results: The dialog box or window will close.

precondition: The "OK" button is visible and clickable.
